author: suchandradutta
body:
Updating TrackerGeometry in Geometry/TrackerGeometryBuilder package adding a feature that given a DetId one can access a ModuleType enumerator  which is defined directly from the name in the geometry xml file 

Updating Phase2TrackerDigitizer with following features
- new data format Phase2TrackerDigi used for the outer tracker detectors (inner PixelDigi is still used for the inner Pixel detectors) 
- removed dependency on StackedTrackerGeometry and the new feature of TrackerGeometry is used instead to identify different types of detectors (PSP, PSS, 2S)

Note : to use this Digitizer in official workflow one needs to update 
- PoolOuputModule definition to include Phase2TrackerDigiedmDetSetVector
- EDAlias definition in SimGeneral/MixingModule/python/aliases_cfi.py should be updated for the Phase2TrackerDigi  as done for PixeDigi
title: 62 slhcdev phase2 tracker digitizer new df
